input.sentences: i went to this promotion event for 888.com .
there were some promotion girls that looked like they were straight from a vegas performance .
there were actually poker | bridge and other table games going on .
here 's another view of the table .

output.sentences: The casino is having an event called 888 promotion.
The promotion in Vegas is straight poker.
There are many people playing poker at the table.
This is a good view of the poker table.
Mom likes Vegas a lot and had her picture taken there.
